sentences.english: The party, however, carried out a thorough reconnaissance of K2 from south to north-east.
sentences.chinese: 然而探险队从南到东北对乔戈里峰完成了彻底的勘探。

sentences.english: The peak has now been climbed from almost all ridges.
sentences.chinese: 现在，几乎从所有的山脊人们都已攀登过乔戈里峰了。
